text: Popped by 6 Letter Brunch randomly for dinner with my 2-year-old and was pleasantly surprised. Didnâ€™t expect much, but the waffle was actually really good and the food overall was impressive. Nice bonusâ€”free kids meal on weekdays when you order a main and any drink. Definitely worth a visit!

Coffee was decent
The bread dish - sourdough could have been toasted for longer. The cheese coupled with the tomato sauce made it very mushy after awhile :(

Also the seats gave me abit of rash - I think it hasnâ€™t been cleaned in awhile.

Atmosphere is cozy but would only return for drinks and not the food.

Went there all the way from the north-east since reviews are good. Food is not that fantastic for the travel. Price is steep for the portion of food. Much better rosti elsewhere and more generous portion with sour cream.

Loved the food and efficient service given.

Enjoyed the Smoke duck carbonara and Salmon aglio olio both were decent size portions and quite tasty ðŸ˜‹
We love 6 letter brunch! Atmosphere is quiet, food is really good and price is reasonable.
